Title: 14.1 Built-In Function and Operator Reference
14.7 Date and Time Functions
Description: Extract the date part of a date or datetime expression

Extracts the date part of the date or datetime expression
          expr. Returns
          NULL if expr is
          NULL.

Press CTRL+C to copy mysql> SELECT DATE('2003-12-31 01:02:03');
        -> '2003-12-31'
